statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND contact_phone = '123-456-7890';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_id IN (3, 6, 9) OR contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_contacts WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierContactInformation;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM SupplierContactInformation ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM SupplierContactInformation WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationHistory ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, communication_type, communication_details FROM CommunicationHistory WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM SupplierContactInformation WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierContactInformation WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM SupplierContactInformation WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL AND supplier_name <> 'Example Supplier';
SELECT communication_id, communication_date, communication_type FROM CommunicationHistory WHERE communication_type = 'Meeting' AND communication_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM CommunicationHistory JOIN SupplierContactInformation ON CommunicationHistory.supplier_id = SupplierContactInformation.supplier_id WHERE SupplierContactInformation.supplier_name = 'New Supplier' ORDER BY CommunicationHistory.communication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM communication_history ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, city, state FROM suppliers INNER JOIN address ON suppliers.supplier_id = address.supplier_id ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name, city FROM suppliers JOIN address ON suppliers.supplier_id = address.supplier_id;

SELECT supplier_name, communication_date, communication_details FROM suppliers JOIN communication_history ON suppliers.supplier_id = communication_history.supplier_id WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT contact_name, phone_number, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM suppliers JOIN address ON suppliers.supplier_id = address.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT communication_date, communication_type, communication_details FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM contacts WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT attachment_name, attachment_url FROM communication_attachments WHERE communication_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY supplier_id;

SELECT c.contact_name, co.communication_date, ca.attachment_name FROM contacts c JOIN communications co ON c.contact_id = co.contact_id JOIN communication_attachments ca ON co.communication_id = ca.communication_id WHERE co.communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY co.communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, COUNT(*) as num_contacts FROM suppliers s JOIN contacts c ON s.supplier_id = c.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_id HAVING num_contacts > 2 ORDER BY num_contacts DESC;

SELECT c.contact_name, ca.attachment_name FROM contacts c LEFT JOIN communication_attachments ca ON c.contact_id = ca.communication_id WHERE ca.attachment_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.contact_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person='John Doe';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, contact_phone FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id=3;
SELECT supplier_name, count(*) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM Products JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id;
SELECT supplier_name, address_line1, city, state FROM Suppliers JOIN Addresses ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Addresses.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationHistory WHERE communication_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
